<title level="1" right="Rules">[Investiture](/Rules.aspx?ID=3163)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 224 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
If a suit of armor has any runes, it has the [invested](/Traits.aspx?ID=637) trait, requiring you to invest it to get its magical benefits.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
